2026-0158
2026-02-24INFCFinancial Administration ActAppointment of a director of the Board of Directors of Canada Lands Company LimitedApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities of Allison Mendes of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of Canada Lands Company Limited, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.N/A
subject: Appointment of a director of the Board of Directors of Canada Lands Company Limited
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities of Allison Mendes of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of Canada Lands Company Limited, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
